articles.description: Spain's manager reflected on a "touch of genius"  as pundits praised "superstar" Lamine Yamal after the victory over France.
articles.title: Lamine Yamal: Spain 'superstar' makes his mark at Euro 2024

articles.description: He's the World Cup winner who was expected to guide France all the way in Germany, but what happened to Kylian Mbappe at Euro 2024?
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: France forward calls Euro 2024 'a failure' after side's semi-final loss

articles.description: England boss Gareth Southgate says "the expectation weighed heavily" at the start of the Euros but his side are ready to "make history".
articles.title: England at Euro 2024: Gareth Southgate says 'expectation weighed heavily' at start of tournament

articles.description: After Novak Djokovic has another run-in with the Wimbledon crowd, Tim Henman says trying to wind up the Serb is the "worst thing you can do".
articles.title: Novak Djokovic: Wimbledon Centre Court fans winding him up makes Serb play better, says Tim Henman

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Spain vs France in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Spain vs France: Euro 2024 build-up, kick-off time, team news & updates

articles.description: England beat New Zealand by 23 runs on the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern method in a rain-curtailed second T20 at Hove to take a 2-0 series lead.
articles.title: England vs New Zealand: Hosts win rain-affected second T20 at Hove

articles.description: Belgium's Jasper Philipsen powers to victory in a sprint finish on stage 10 of the Tour de France as Tadej Pogacar retains the leader's yellow jersey.
articles.title: Philipsen powers to victory on stage 10 of Tour de France

articles.description: Daniil Medvedev beats top seed Jannik Sinner in five sets to reach the semi-finals at Wimbledon for the second year running.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Daniil Medvedev beats Jannik Sinner in five sets to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Qualifier Lulu Sun's dream run to the Wimbledon quarter-finals was ended by Croatian Donna Verkic under the roof on Court One.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Qualifier Lulu Sun beaten by Donna Vekic

articles.description: New US captain Keegan Bradley is prepared to travel to LIV Golf events to help select the strongest 12 golfers for the 2025 Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Keegan Bradley: New US Ryder Cup captain 'wants the 12 best players' for 2025 event
